description: User login (US-017) requires a user account to be created, which is done during tenant registration (US-001).
mitigation_plan: Planned sequentially in the same sprint.

description: Role-based routing (US-021) can only occur after a user has been successfully authenticated (US-017).
mitigation_plan: Planned sequentially in the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Prevents users from accessing any part of the application post-login.

description: Check-in functionality (US-028) requires GPS data, which is gated by the location permission flow (US-076).
mitigation_plan: Implement and test permission handling first.

description: Automatic sync (US-034) depends on the ability to create and cache records offline (US-033).
mitigation_plan: Planned sequentially in the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of the offline feature set.
